thread.title: Hemalata Natrajan

author: Hemalata Natrajan
title: Hemalata Natrajan
text: My husband heard their Ad in radio and said to check the fares which was to good to believe for our India trip.I must admit Harmet was excellent.Based on our requirement she pulled out the best deal.Very efficient and informed.Couldnt be more satisfied then this.Big shout out for Harmeet Kaur.Keep up the Good work.We are sure stopping by for our future trips
